title: Women working in the media
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Women in the broadcasting industry
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Reporters and reporting
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Women in television

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television broadcasting
description: Pat Walter, a video camera operator, Julie Copeland, a radio broadcaster and producer, and Lina Caneva, a TV and radio journalist, discuss their experiences as women working in the male-dominated TV and radio industry.
